title: Sydney Bootcamp Episode 4 | Legend Tour

embed.description: Thanks to our sponsor Legend. We were able to make this Bootcamp happen. Here is a tour of their facility and what it meant to the guys being there. Emprox â–ºTwitter: https://twitter.com/EmproxGG â–ºFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/emproxgg/ â–ºInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/emproxgg/ â–ºDiscord: https://t.co/Ous2eUyUSh

body:
In order to have a better look at the facilities, our Team manager gave us a tour of the Legend Cyber Cafe. Legends played a crucial part by providing facilities for the team to train while they were in Sydney and it shows how business do really support the growth of esports in this day an era.
